nodes.text: V1C-0RY was an assassin droid stationed aboard Carrick Station, a Galactic Republic space station, during the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The droid functioned as a business vendor on the station and claimed to have an extensive inventory.
V1C-0RY appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion. He functioned as a Conquest Rewards vendor.
